properties.headline: Flood Warning issued February 13 at 12:47PM EST until February 13 at 9:13PM EST by NWS Peachtree City GA
properties.description:
...The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a Flood
Warning for the following rivers in Georgia...

Alcovy River near Lawrenceville affecting Gwinnett and Walton
Counties


.Recent heavy rainfall has caused significant runoff into streams and
rivers which will cause flooding in some areas.

The National Weather Service in Peachtree City has issued a
* Flood Warning for
The Alcovy River near Lawrenceville.
* From this afternoon until this evening.
* At 12 PM Thursday the stage was 9 feet...and rising.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 9 feet.
* Forecast to rise above flood stage by this afternoon and continue
to rise to near 9.1 feet by this afternoon. The river will fall
below flood stage by late this afternoon.
* At 9 feet...Flood stage is reached. Minor flooding begins of the
woodlands upstream and downstream from the river gauge at New Hope
Road.
properties.instruction:
All persons with interests along the river should monitor the latest
forecasts...and be prepared to take necessary precautions to protect
life and property.

The latest stage data was furnished in cooperation with the United
States Geological Survey.
